title: SoC COMM_ST 394-0-20 Communication Studies Research Seminar

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This section provides a general introduction to theory and research concerning health-related persuasion, especially in the context of health communication campaigns. The course covers leading theoretical frameworks that have guided health persuasion research and practice (e.g., the transtheoretical model) and research concerning health communication campaigns (campaign planning, execution, and evaluation). Students will complete a substantial research paper and contribute to class discussion of readings.
